attributes.action: Help to buy scheme to revert back to allowing previous home owners to use
attributes.additional_details: Because there is a certain age group that has been forgotten about
attributes.background: I feel middle aged “first time buyers” have been forgotten about, lots of help for younger people to get on the housing ladder but none for us who have lost our houses in the recession or through divorce.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573863
